EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Carol, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on my email below. Are you still interested in learning more about MBO Partners? Please let me know when you have a moment. Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, June 15, 2012 12:16 PM To: 'bcarol83@gmail.com' Subject: MBO Partners Dear Carol, Thank you for the blog suggestion you submitted on the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVJYp0h6s6%2B5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVJYp0h6s6%2B5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVJYp0h6s6%2B5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVJYp0h6s6%2B5JaTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
